scripts.prettier: npx ts-refactor organizeImports "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*" --dontAsk && npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test
scripts.browserify: rm -rf dist build && npm run build && mkdir -p build && npx browserify   -x blessed  -x term.js -x blessed-contrib -x editor-widget  -x text-buffer dist/src/main.js -o build/cli-fonts-gallery.js --ignore-missing   --no-debug && cp src/browser/* build && npx terser build/cli-fonts-gallery.js -o build/cli-fonts-gallery.js && mkdir -p ../../docs/browser && mv build/* ../../docs/browser
